game.name: OutBreak: The Last Survivor
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: OutBreak is a multiplayer post-apocalyptic survival game. Explore a ruined world, face other players, gather resources, and make tough choices to survive one more day.
game.shortDescriptionEn: OutBreak is a multiplayer post-apocalyptic survival game. Explore a ruined world, face other players, gather resources, and make tough choices to survive one more day.
